Name: Kid Kujirai
Title: Temari-Hiding Intentions: Kid Kujirai
Desc: "When you hide a Temari, you have to hide it within the time of a Temari song. The person who is looking for it will also find it within a song's time. That will make the game fair!"

Talent.Name: Kid Kujirai
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> Create 1 $[K411]. Then if your opponent's Support Zone is not full, transfer this card to your opponent's Support Zone.

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
